subject: Track and Field
Running
lead_paragraph: A United States team anchored by Ryan Bailey won the 4x100-meter relay, defeating a Usain Bolt-led Jamaican team at the International Association of Athletics Federations World Relays meet in Nassau, the Bahamas.
snippet: A United States team anchored by Ryan Bailey won the 4x100-meter relay, defeating a Usain Bolt-led Jamaican team at the International Association of Athletics Federations World Relays meet in Nassau, the Bahamas.
